summary: Running from mistakes of the past, a man finds a secret book with ancient powers. But a Dark Force has been awoken, one that will stop at nothing to reclaim the sacred text. When the book is stolen, an age long battle resumes.
cast: Eric Roberts|Peter Stormare|Sally Kirkland|Jsu Garcia|Howard Lazar|Sara Malakul Lane|Rick Ojeda|Sebastian Michael Barr|Joshua H. Behn|Nina Bergman|Matthew Albert Cole|Bill Cox|Claudia Craciun|Brandyn Cross|Laura Eichhorn|Reb Fleming|Renny Grames|Evan Hart|Daniel Windhymm Hayes|John Hinckley|Tod Huntington|Rachel Lara|Chad Martineau|Cathleen Mason|Eddie Melchor|Valerie Mikita|Nicholas Neve|Arv Nielson|Nicole Pano|Thomas J. Post|Dylan Ramsey|William 'Bus' Riley|Eliza Roberts|Kaley Victoria Rose|Rosemberg Salgado|Natalie Smyka|Leigh Taylor-Young|Bethany Therese|Jullian Dulce Vida|Scott W. Warren|Lindsey LeAnn Watson|Warren Workman|Moshe Yehoshoua|Emily Yeskel|Malin Yhr|Dey Young
title: The Wayshower
